import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import '../style/Home.scss'; import Hero from '../images/Hero-Image.png'; import Trustpilot from '../images/trustpilot-logo.svg'; import Group from '../images/Group.png'; import house from '../images/house.png'; import Menu from './Menu'; import step1 from '../images/Step-01.png'; import step2 from '../images/Step-02.png'; import contentpattern from '../images/Content-Pattern.svg'; import phone from '../images/Phones.png'; import FoodTakeaway from '../images/Food-Takeaway.png'; import GroupPhoto from '../images/Group-Photo.png'; import FootSteps from '../images/footsteps.svg'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { IntlProvider, FormattedMessage } from 'react-intl'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { fetchMenu } from '../action'; import Messages from '../Messages'; const Home = (props) => { const [active, setActive] = useState("Burgers"); useEffect(() => { props.fetchMenu("Burgers"); console.log(Messages); }, []); const tags = [ { image: house, heading: 'Adapt your menu items', info: 'Easily adapt your menu using the webflow CMS and allow customers to browse your items.' }, { image: step1, heading: 'Accept online orders & takeout', info: 'Let your customers order and pay via the powerful ecommerce system, or simple let them call your store.' }, { image: step2, heading: 'Manage delivery or takeout', info: 'Manage your own logistics and take orders simply through the ecommerce system.' } ] const MENU = props.menu; console.log(MENU, "MENU"); return (

); }; const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { menu: state.menu }; } export default connect(mapStateToProps, { fetchMenu })(Home);
